text: 9.1.1 Breadth First Search e Uses a queue data structure. e To find whether a graph is connected or not. e To find number of connected components in a given graph (Breadth First traversal is used) e To detect cycle in a graph. e To find whether a given graph is bipartite or not. e T.C.=0(V +E) using Adjacency List = O(V?) using Adjacency matrix. e To find shortest path in undirected graph without weights.
